data.comment: Today's referee, Federico La Penna, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Parma Calcio.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Parma Calcio are pushing forward but Gervinho's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Parma.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In Parma Fiorentina drive forward through Cristiano Biraghi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 9, Federico La Penna signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
Fiorentina drives forward and Franck Ribery gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 12, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Federico La Penna signals a throw-in for Parma Calcio, close to Fiorentina's area.
Parma Calcio's Hernani misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In Parma, Parma Calcio push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Fiorentina's Christian Kouame attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, Federico La Penna awards Parma Calcio a goal kick.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Ennio Tardini.
Ball safe as Parma Calcio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Parma Calcio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Ennio Tardini.
Gaetano Castrovilli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 31, Free kick Fiorentina.
Fiorentinaâ€™s Gaetano Castrovilli is on his feet again at Ennio Tardini.
Federico La Penna signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Parma Calcio's half.
In the minute 32, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Parma Calcio.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Fiorentina are coming forward and Erick Pulgar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Parma Calcio have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma Calcio's half?
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 42, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Franck Ribery (Fiorentina) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Ennio Tardini.
The second-half is underway at Ennio Tardini.
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Federico La Penna awards the away team a throw-in.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 50, Parma Calcio to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 52, Parma Calcio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Parma.
In the minute 55, Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Yann Karamoh is replacing Roberto Inglese for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
The home team replace Hernani with Simon Sohm.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Parma Calcio.
In the minute 59, Parma Calcio push upfield but Federico La Penna quickly pulls them for offside.
Parma Calcio needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 62, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Parma Calcio are whistled for offside.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Parma Calcio in their own half.
Can Parma Calcio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Parma Calcio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Giuseppe Pezzella (Parma Calcio) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Christian Kouame with Patrick Cutrone. This is the first substitution made today by Giuseppe Iachini.
In the minute 70, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Parma Calcio in their own half.
Pol Lirola is replacing Lorenzo Venuti for the away team.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Nikola Milenkovic (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Federico La Penna.
Bruno Alves (Parma Calcio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Parma Calcio have been awarded a corner by Federico La Penna.
In the minute 75, Free kick Parma Calcio.
Parma Calcio drive upfield and Juraj Kucka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Goal kick for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 77, Federico La Penna awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio at Ennio Tardini.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Parma Calcio.
In the minute 80, Fabio Liverani is making the team's third substitution at Ennio Tardini with Juan Brunetta replacing Gervinho.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 81, Fiorentina pushes forward through Gaetano Castrovilli, whose finish on goal is saved.
Parma Calcio are in shooting range from this free kick.
Juraj Kucka of Parma Calcio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 83, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Giuseppe Iachini (Fiorentina) is making a third substitution, with Giacomo Bonaventura replacing Gaetano Castrovilli.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 85, Sofyan Amrabat (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Parma a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Ennio Tardini.
In the minute 89, Federico La Penna signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Parma Calcio territory.
Federico La Penna awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Fiorentina.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Parma.
Throw-in for Parma Calcio in the half of Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
